name: Barrett

conversation.response_text: Goddamn are you one ugly son-of-a-bitch!

description:
Barrett is a 95 year-old Caucasian Male.

A weathered ghoul serving as both bodyguard and scientific assistant to Murphy at Northwest Seneca Station. Barrett's tattered clothing and scarred face tell a story of survival in the harsh Capitol Wasteland.

Barrett's Personality: Loyal and pragmatic, Barrett is protective of Murphy and dedicated to their chem operation. He speaks sparingly but with authority when necessary.

Barrett's Backstory: Once a resident of the pre-War era, Barrett was ghoulified during the Great War. He eventually found his way to the Capital Wasteland and aligned with Murphy, recognizing a mutual benefit in their partnership. Barrett's combat skills and knowledge of the wasteland make him invaluable to Murphy's operation.
